meanings.definition: The act of creating or using slogans to promote a cause or idea.
meanings.sent1: Her sloganeering for the charity event inspired many to join the cause.
meanings.sent2: The company's success was partly due to their effective sloganeering in marketing campaigns.
meanings.sent3: During the meeting, his constant sloganeering about teamwork became a running joke.
meanings.sent4: In the world of politics, sloganeering can sometimes overshadow actual policy discussions.
meanings.sent5: The power of her sloganeering made the message unforgettable to all who heard it.

meanings.definition: The practice of using catchy phrases or slogans in advertising or political campaigns.
meanings.sent1: The candidate's sloganeering during the election resonated with many voters.
meanings.sent2: Successful companies often invest in effective sloganeering to attract customers.
meanings.sent3: His constant sloganeering about the new product made everyone in the office curious to try it.
meanings.sent4: The art of sloganeering is crucial in capturing the attention of the target audience.
meanings.sent5: The clever sloganeering of the marketing team boosted sales significantly.
